channel.title: CVE Feed for Forma -- Forma LMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Forma -- Forma LMS

item.title: CVE-2022-41680|2024-09-16T16:48:22.527Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: Forma LMS on its 3.1.0 version and earlier is vulnerable to a SQL injection vulnerability. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an authenticated attacker (with the role of student) to perform a SQL injection on the 'search[value] parameter in the appLms/ajax.server.php?r=mycertificate/getMyCertificates' function in order to dump the entire database.
